summary: Adds a better night eye power to the game, no blur and without the bluish color.
descriptionHtml:
Adds a better night eye power to the game, no blur and without the bluish color. Nights now look more like day time.

To install:
Put the esp in the data folder and check it in the laucher.
Or NMM

To add the power:
1) in the console you enter: help "day vision"
2) press enter key
3) look for "SPEL: (NUMBER) 'day vision'"
4) in the console you enter: player.addspell NUMBER
5) press enter key
6) done
author: sjmortepop
